data.title: Great little breakfast and lunch place
data.text: On 2-21-16 at approximately 0800 hrs, I stopped by for breakfast and was met promptly by a nice waitress who was polite and cheerful.  I ordered Huevos Rancheros, with a side of bread rather than tortillas and some fresh squeezed orange juice.  I was very surprised when the orange juice came out in a pre-frosted glass.  The huevos rancheros had a delightful and flavorful. My waitress along with other waitresses were quick to check to see if I needed anything else.
